attributes.action: Prevent Monies going to the IMF
attributes.additional_details:
From a BBC Article which stands correct as at 6th November 2011 it is the intention of the Treasury Cheif Secretary Danny Alexander to give £40bn to the IMF.

Giving and Lending are 2 completely different things!

I must say this is rash and not acceptable as we voted for a tough time but this will make it tougher.

I want the government to pass a bill demanding that any monies collected from public funds to go to a referendum so that the people of the UK can decide what the funds go on.
